channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The guy behind retirement’s 4% rule now thinks that’s way too low. Here’s how much more money you could spend.
item.description: Bill Bengen revised his formula and has a new “rule” for retirement investors.

item.title: Macy’s says it’s being ‘surgical’ with price hikes amid tariffs, will eat some costs
item.description: “We’re being incredibly surgical about the situation with tariffs,” said Macy’s Chief Financial Officer Adrian Mitchell.

item.title: Abercrombie’s stock back in rally mode as outlook shows tariffs won’t hurt sales
item.description: Retailer’s stock heads for its best day in two years after a quarterly earnings beat fueled by a big jump in Hollister sales and an improved outlook f...

item.title: GameStop makes its first bitcoin buy. Here’s why the stock is pulling back.
item.description: GameStop’s purchase of 4,710 bitcoin marks its first cryptocurrency purchase since the videogame retailer announced earlier this year that it would ma...

item.title: How to afford retirement in America? Keep working.
item.description: Growing numbers of workers now plan to work part time in retirement, either because they want to, need to or both.

item.title: These stocks will move the most from Nvidia’s AI earnings report
item.description: Nvidia isn’t the only stock that will move following the chipmaker’s earnings reports, UBS's trading desk found.

item.title: GameStop drops 9% despite initiating bitcoin buying plan with $500 million purchase
item.description: The purchase, GameStop's first investment in bitcoin, was worth $512.6 million with bitcoin's price of $108,837 Wednesday.

item.title: Baird upgrades credit scoring stock after plunging on regulatory concern
item.description: The investment firm upgraded the credit scoring firm to outperform from neutral.

item.title: These biotech stocks will benefit as generative AI speeds up drug discovery, Jefferies says
item.description: The adoption of generative AI in drug discovery will save companies years and billions of dollars in getting new drugs to market, the firm said.

item.title: These stocks could be winners if Trump devalues the U.S. dollar, according to Jefferies
item.description: Companies with large overseas sales, particularly China, could benefit if the White House engineers a deliberate dollar devaluation, according to Jeff...
